Charles Coleman (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Coleman_(actor) 0 Charles Pearce Coleman (December 22, 1885 – March 8, 1951) was an Australian-born American character actor of the silent and sound film eras. Charles_Pearce_Coleman ( December_22 , 1885 – March_8_,_1951 ) was an_Australian-born_American_character_actor of the_silent_and_sound_film_eras .
